text: Joshua van Heerden (born 26 June 1998) is a South African cricketer. He made his Twenty20 debut for Eastern Province in the 2018 Africa T20 Cup on 14 September 2018. He made his first-class debut for Eastern Province in the 2018–19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup on 11 October 2018. He made his List A debut for Eastern Province in the 2018–19 CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge on 13 January 2019. In September 2019, he was named in Eastern Province's squad for the 2019–20 CSA Provincial T20 Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:Eastern Province cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Joshua van Heerden
